title: Tech Mahindra 'juniorisation' strategy bets on tier 2,3 talent, here's how - Fortune India
content: Tech Mahindra 'juniorisation' strategy bets on tier 2,3 talent, here's how  Fortune India
description: IT firms are ramping up intake of freshers to counter high attrition. Tech Mahindra calls it the ‘juniorisation’, with plans to add 10,000 freshers in 2022.
